title: Corn more profitable than wheat, shifts supply

content.prompt: If growing corn becomes more profitable than growing wheat, which of the following will occur?

choices.label: The supply of corn will decrease.
The price of wheat will decrease.
The price of corn will decrease.
The demand for wheat will increase.
The demand for corn will increase.

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
